title: Age.of.Empires.2.complete.v1.0c.REPACK-vol1
description:
Age.of.Empires.2.complete.v1.0c.REPACK-vol1


Contains the game Age of Empires 2 :The Age of Kings and The Conquerors expansion.
The game is patched to v2.0a (AoK) and 1.0c (Conquerors), which are the final versions.


This torrent contains a lot of additional stuff. ("stuff" folder)


- color fix (.bat + DirectDrawFix)
- userpatch v1.4 RC
- game manual (PDF)
- patch 1.0e
- forgotten Empires v2.2

For more information, see the .nfo.


1. Mount or unpack .iso
2. Install
3. Play	

My recommendation would be to install the game and then the "userpatch" ("SetupAoC.exe"), to be able to change the resolution to HD and to have background music (which does not play otherwise, due to no-CD fix).
